chapter.title: Chapter 4
chapter.subtitle: Outages
chapter.para: Access the outage page by clicking on the "Outages" link in the main menu. On this page there is a table that contains information about all current outages for all managed devices. On this page, there is information regarding the type of outages, affected nodes and interfaces as well as the times of the outages. Clicking links in this table will provide additional information such as availability, events, and historical outages.
